articles.title: Welcome to Pandora: Check out the new Avatar immersive exhibit at Gardens by the Bay's Cloud Forest - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Fancy meeting one of Pandora's banshees? Wondering what you'll look like as a Na'vi? Visit Avatar: The Experience exhibition at Gardens by the Bay ahead of the upcoming sequel to James Cameron's blockbuster sci-fi movie.
articles.content:
Meanwhile, the Cloud Forest itself has undergone its own Avatar transformation, with an additional 5,700 plants comprising more than 160 species, of which 20 are new to Gardens by the Bay.

articles.author: Lucia Stein
articles.title: Vladimir Putin's military draft sent thousands of men fleeing to Kazakhstan, driving up rents in its biggest cities - ABC News
articles.description: With Vladimir Putin's forces in trouble in Ukraine, the Kremlin's ability to exert influence over post-Soviet states is being put to the test, driving some allies to seek other powerful relationships in Central Asia.
articles.content:
Though thousands of kilometres away from the front-line in Ukraine, the consequences of Vladimir Putin's deadly war are being sharply felt in Kazakhstan.

articles.title: Sunak is Britain’s first Asian prime minister, but this diversity success was no accident - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Images captured inside No. 10 this Diwali told a story Britons have never heard before: the prime minister, hands together in prayer, a garland of roses around his neck.
articles.content:
The unceasing political turmoil triggered by the 2016 Brexit referendum has sparked enormous churn in the British government.
